projects.name: Librora
projects.oneLiner: Reading companion: track reading, manage book collection, discover insights.
projects.essence: User-facing reading tracker / personal library product. Helps users build reading habits, organize their book collections, track progress, and discover new books based on their preferences.

projects.name: Litrlly
projects.oneLiner: AI-powered English pronunciation learning app with voice recording and feedback.
projects.essence: B2C learning app focused on pronunciation practice and instant analysis. Uses AI to provide real-time feedback on English pronunciation, helping users improve their speaking skills through interactive exercises and personalized coaching.

projects.name: Litrlly Kids
projects.oneLiner: Fun interactive English learning for kids (grammar, reading, listening, speaking).
projects.essence: Kids-focused learning experience with age-appropriate content, gamification, and child-safe UX constraints. Part of the Litrlly product family but with distinct branding, simplified interfaces, and content curated for younger learners.

frontend.name: TBD
frontend.notes: To be determined - may share codebase with Litrlly main app

backend.name: TBD
backend.notes: To be determined - may share backend with Litrlly
